# Aeterni.eco

### Sustainability consultancy and financing

Aeterni is a sustainability and impact advisory company, providing strategic guidance to organizations aiming to integrate sustainability into their core business practices.

Our services cover corporate sustainability, where we deliver comprehensive assessments, roadmaps, and value chain management strategies, ensuring businesses meet their sustainability objectives while enhancing governance. We also offer carbon services, including life cycle assessments, corporate carbon footprint analysis, and carbon credit advisory, empowering companies to reduce emissions and comply with regulatory requirements. Additionally, our expertise in sustainable finance helps businesses quantify sustainability impacts, develop financing frameworks, and assess climate risks, fostering resilience and long-term value creation.

##### Expertise in the following

Sustainability Accounting & Sustainable Corporate Finance

Aeterni is a sustainability and impact advisory company, providing strategic guidance to organizations aiming to integrate sustainability into their core business practices.

Our services cover corporate sustainability, where we deliver comprehensive assessments, roadmaps, and value chain management strategies, ensuring businesses meet their sustainability objectives while enhancing governance. We also offer carbon services, including life cycle assessments, corporate carbon footprint analysis, and carbon credit advisory, empowering companies to reduce emissions and comply with regulatory requirements. Additionally, our expertise in sustainable finance helps businesses quantify sustainability impacts, develop financing frameworks, and assess climate risks, fostering resilience and long-term value creation.
